header.title: MARSFLY  AUTOPILOT AP200
header.description: MARSFly Autopilot AP200, designed for lower-cost UAVs, provides autonomous capabilities for  UAVs performing various mapping or tactical missions.   The AP200 autopilot system seamlessly blends state-of-the-art algorithms with intuitive design to  meet safety, convenience, and flight performance objectives.

footer.title: Specifications
footer.description: Read more about  MARSFly Autopilot AP200.
